form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION, Form Approved OMB No. 4-43 R46

full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 FORM G-325 (REV. 8-1-74)Y UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE LOS BIOGRAPHIC Form Approved INFORMATION Immigration and Naturalization Service 24 OMB No. 43-R436 OCT 30 1981 (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE (Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY DIAT REGISTRATION NO. (If any) LUONG Kong Ping FEMALE Aug. 20, 1909 Vietnamese A23 732 123 ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. (If any) LUONG, Ping Kong Hai Ninh, Viet Nam 586-30-2145 FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH (If known) CITY AND COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE FATHER LUONG, Huong China Deceased MOTHER (Maiden name) TRAN, Thi China Deceased HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) WIFE WONG Tai abt. 1909 Canton, China 1929 Canton, China FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES (If none, so state) NONE FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE AND PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR 2603 Sichel Street Los Angeles CA USA 12 1978 PRESENT TIME 5233 Baltimore Street Los Angeles CA USA 12 1977 12 1978 Labuan Malaysia 6 1977 12 1977 591/4/6 Duong Binh Thoi Saigon Viet Nam 6 1977 APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR 591/4/6 Duong Binh Thoi Saigon Viet Nam 1954 6 1977 APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST. FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATION (Specify) MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR PRESENT TIME China and Viet Nam Fisherman 1929 6 1977 Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT OR PETITIONER DATE NATURALIZATION OTHER (SPECIFY) ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS KONG ANY WONG Sept. 16,1980 IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IS IN OTHER THAN ROMAN LETTERS, WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IN THIS SPACE: Are all copies legible? Yes 7,745 PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT.
